regularlighter.com variety of lighters, tobacco and ciggies.

    Pricing strategy for 1bn initial cost↑

    Pricing strategy [draft]

    We set pricing strategy, minimum official selling price is 20 USD/EURO/British Pound, your 1st Regular Lighter® produced price should be set to total price of your equipment and time spent, 2nd should be half of 1st lighter price, 3rd should be 1/3rd, and so on.

    Below is calculation excerpt for 10001 pieces, with initial cost 1 000 000 000 USD/EURO/GBP.

    Due to ROMAN numbers limitation, we suggest custom coding, e.g for 9999 case it should be 9MCMXCI. For uncertain situations, number should be vertically aligned, not horizontally.

    2 II : 500000000.0
